name: SliderValue
description:
Displays the current value of the slider as text.
Renders an `<output>` element.

children.detailedType:
| ((
    formattedValues: string[],
    values: number[],
  ) => ReactNode)
| null
| undefined

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
render.detailedType:
| ReactElement
| ((
    props: HTMLProps,
    state: Slider.Root.State,
  ) => ReactElement)

data-dragging.description: Present while the user is dragging.

data-orientation.description: Indicates the orientation of the slider.

data-disabled.description: Present when the slider is disabled.

data-valid.description: Present when the slider is in valid state (when wrapped in Field.Root).

data-invalid.description: Present when the slider is in invalid state (when wrapped in Field.Root).

data-dirty.description: Present when the slider's value has changed (when wrapped in Field.Root).

data-touched.description: Present when the slider has been touched (when wrapped in Field.Root).

data-focused.description: Present when the slider is focused (when wrapped in Field.Root).
